title: The Week of Kevin Hayes: Superhero at Sixty
summary: Kevin Hayes, a 60-year-old cooking enthusiast and mentor, discovers his ability to inspire literal growth in people and plants, using his newfound powers to transform his community over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Kevin Hayes, ein 60-jähriger Kochbegeisterter und Mentor, entdeckt seine Fähigkeit, wörtliches Wachstum bei Menschen und Pflanzen zu inspirieren. Er nutzt seine neu entdeckten Kräfte, um seine Gemeinschaft im Laufe einer Woche zu verwandeln.
summaryDutch: Kevin Hayes, een 60-jarige kookliefhebber en mentor, ontdekt zijn vermogen om letterlijke groei bij mensen en planten te inspireren. Hij gebruikt zijn nieuw gevonden krachten om zijn gemeenschap gedurende een week te transformeren.
summaryFrench: Kevin Hayes, un passionné de cuisine et mentor de 60 ans, découvre sa capacité à inspirer une croissance littérale chez les personnes et les plantes. Il utilise ses nouveaux pouvoirs pour transformer sa communauté au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Kevin discovers his powers while gardening. To his surprise, plants he tenderly cares for grow at an accelerated rate.
Testing his abilities, Kevin helps a neighbor's wilted garden. By evening, it's in full bloom, stunning the neighborhood.
Word spreads. Locals flock to Kevin, asking for guidance on personal and community projects.
Kevin mentors a troubled youth, helping him see his potential. They work together in the garden, and the boy’s outlook brightens.
The community starts a garden project led by Kevin, turning a barren park into a lush green space.
Kevin hosts a cooking and gardening class. Relationships blossom among attendees, including a touch of romance for Kevin.
A celebration is held in the new community garden, with Kevin as the guest of honor.

ending: And so, through nurturing both the soil and the soul, Kevin Hayes sowed seeds of change that would nourish his community for years to come.
moral: Great power often comes in gentle forms, and true leadership blooms from the seeds of care and mentorship.
